content: Just past this final Buddha statue head, look through the archway opening in the rocky wall. Ahead you’ll spot a group of stone floating in the air, signaling your next boss fight is at hand. There's also a strange large rock to the left - make a note of it and we'll inspect it later.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rockrest Flat' and the sub-subsection 'The Sixth Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Just past this final Buddha statue head, look through the archway opening in the rocky wall. Ahead you’ll spot a group of stone floating in the air, signaling your next boss fight is at hand. There's also a strange large rock to the left - make a note of it and we'll inspect it later.
